info.headline: Tornado Warning issued September 24 at 12:32PM CDT until September 24 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
TORSHV
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... West Central Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
* Until 100 PM CDT.
* At 1232 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 6 miles southwest of Blanchard, or 11 miles northwest of Shreveport, moving east at 15 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... Shreveport and Blanchard.
info.instruction: Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a well-built building away from windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 1:00 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 1:00 PM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued September 24 at 12:32PM CDT until September 24 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
TORSHV

* Tornado Warning for... West Central Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
* Until 100 PM CDT.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 1:00 PM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 1:00 PM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
